About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a mechatronic engineer graduated from TecMilenio University in Monterrey, N.L.
My career path has been as a desktop and web software developer. I am an extremely proactive, resilient and self-taught person. I am passionate about the area of Front End and user experience development
Go to My Work if you want to know what I have done.

LionPOS

Project leader and Front end developer

2020 : Current - Planning and Development of a Point of Sale program for the management of restaurants, elaborated in a front end enviroment with the react framework and connection with third party APIs

GRUMA

Back end and business analyst intern

2018 : 2019 - Planning and Development of a small ERP system for information gathering and decision making, elaborated in a back end enviroment with C# and MySQL

QA Intern
